name: Track
description: Song title as it appears on Spotify.

name: Album_Name
description: Name of the album or single the track belongs to.

name: Artist
description: Primary performing artist for the track.

name: Release_Date
description: Official release date of the track.

name: All_Time_Spotify_Rank
description: All-time ranking of the track on Spotify by total streams (1 = most streamed).

name: Track_Score
description: Composite track score summarizing performance across platforms.

name: Spotify_Streams
description: Total number of Spotify streams for the track.

name: Spotify_Popularity
description: Spotify popularity score for the track (0â€“100, higher = more popular).

name: YouTube_Views
description: Total number of YouTube views associated with the track.

name: YouTube_Likes
description: Total number of YouTube likes associated with the track.

name: Explicit_Track_Ratings
description: Explicit flag for the track (1 = explicit content, 0 = non-explicit).

name: Shazam_Counts
description: Total number of Shazam recognitions for the track.
